abstract.para: Installation of &peloton; should be straightforward on many platforms but there are always occasions when a manual install may be required. This document details installation procedures and the packages, libraries and applications upon which &peloton; depends.

sect2.title: Python libraries
sect2.para: The following pythonlibraries are either required always (R) or required when using particular modules (M) and must be installed either by installer scripts (distutils, Debian package etc) or by the system administrator.

listitem.para: RabbitMQ is a supported messaging backend. MQ servers need to be running in the &peloton; environment and these can be downloaded from the RabbitMQ site at . Packages are available for many platforms including Debian/Ubunto and Windows - these include or will cause to be installed the Erlang language libraries.
